original: Nahīnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… namajjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… napaṇītaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hīnam dhammam paṭicca pe na majjhimam dhammam paṭicca pe na paṇītam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke ekavīsa pe avigate ekūnatisa
